text: Shadow Creek is an eighteen-hole golf course in North Las Vegas, Nevada owned by MGM Resorts International. In 2018 it hosted The Match: Tiger vs. Phil, a match play challenge between Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson.https://www.pga.com/news/golf-buzz/tiger-woods-phil-mickelson-match- score-highlights-results It hosted the PGA Tour's CJ Cup in October 2020, after the tournament was relocated from South Korea in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. ==History== It opened in 1989, Shadow Creek was built on a site, at a reported cost of sixty million dollars. Originally operated as Steve Wynn's private club, it later opened to a limited number of MGM hotel guests. Its $500 green fee made it one of the most expensive courses open to the general public. ==Golf course== The Tom Fazio designed golf course was built by Steve Wynn in 1990. title: Shadow Creek Golf Course
